title: Non-aural set, minuet trio - form diagram

content.question: Which of the following best represents the form of the piece?

choices.label: Answer A shows a left repeat sign, an A, a double repeat sign, an A and a right repeat sign.
Answer B shows a left repeat sign, A, double repeat sign, B, A', and right repeat sign.
Answer C shows a left repeat sign, A, double repeat sign, B, C, D, and right repeat sign.
Answer D shows a left repeat sign, A, B, double repeat sign, B, A', and right repeat sign.

content.answer: Answer B shows a left repeat sign, A, double repeat sign, B, A', and right repeat sign.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 2.F: Use terms and symbols to describe formal features and relationships in notated music, including motives, phrases, and phrase relationships.
